comment.body:
>Posty sponsorowane są widoczne

To raczej niedobrze.
@FadeMind Mógłbyś jeszcze proszę dodatkowo dodać tę regułę:
```adblock
instagram.com#$?#article[class] > div[class]:has(span:contains(/Anzeige|Gesponsert|Sponsored|Geborg|Sponzorováno|Sponsoreret|Χορηγούμενη|Publicidad|Sponsoroitu|Sponsorisé|Bersponsor|Sponsorizzato|広告|광고|Ditaja|Sponset|Gesponsord|Sponsorowane|Patrocinado|Реклама|Sponsrad|ได้รับการสนับสนุน|May Sponsor|Sponsorlu|赞助内容|贊助|প্রযোজিত|પ્રાયોજિત|स्पॉन्सर्ड|Sponzorirano|ಪ್ರಾಯೋಜಿತ|സ്‌പോൺസർ ചെയ്‌തത്|पुरस्‍कृत|प्रायोजित|ਪ੍ਰਾਯੋਜਿਤ|මුදල් ගෙවා ප්‍රචාරය කරන ලදි|Sponzorované|விளம்பரதாரர்கள்|స్పాన్సర్ చేసింది|Được tài trợ|Спонсорирано|Commandité|Sponsorizat|Спонзорисано/)) { height: 1px !important; visibility: hidden !important; }
```
i sprawdzić, czy sponsorowane posty są ukryte oraz czy treść normalnie się ładuje?

@FadeMind Niestety nie potrafię tego odtworzyć.
Mógłbyś proszę dodać tę regułę:
```adblock
instagram.com#@?#article[class] > div[class]:-abp-has(span:-abp-contains(/Anzeige|Gesponsert|Sponsored|Geborg|Sponzorováno|Sponsoreret|Χορηγούμενη|Publicidad|Sponsoroitu|Sponsorisé|Bersponsor|Sponsorizzato|広告|광고|Ditaja|Sponset|Gesponsord|Sponsorowane|Patrocinado|Реклама|Sponsrad|ได้รับการสนับสนุน|May Sponsor|Sponsorlu|赞助内容|贊助|প্রযোজিত|પ્રાયોજિત|स्पॉन्सर्ड|Sponzorirano|ಪ್ರಾಯೋಜಿತ|സ്‌പോൺസർ ചെയ്‌തത്|पुरस्‍कृत|प्रायोजित|ਪ੍ਰਾਯੋਜਿਤ|මුදල් ගෙවා ප්‍රචාරය කරන ලදි|Sponzorované|விளம்பரதாரர்கள்|స్పాన్సర్ చేసింది|Được tài trợ|Спонсорирано|Commandité|Sponsorizat|Спонзорисано/))
```

do reguł użytkownika, a potem sprawdzić, czy problem nadal występuje?

It breaks live tv here - `https://www.tvnet.com.tr/canli-yayin`

comment.body:
Yes, I made a typo in the rule. The `*` was in the wrong place.

You can the following page: https://jsfiddle.net/g349e61m/
The rules I used:
```
jshell.net##DIV[class*="cde"]
jshell.net##DIV[class*="threeposts"]
```
These rules block the correct DIV element in the desktop AdGuard browser plugin. But I couldn't make it work in the mobile AdGuard Content Blocker plugin.

Реклама в приложении не повторилась. Пожалуйста, попробуйте остановить приложение, очистить кеш и повторить рекламу. Затем сделайте скриншоты журнала фильтрации и прикрепите их в комментарии к задаче.

comment.body:
Wygląda na to, że problem powoduje lista `EasyList Cookie List`, więc dodaj proszę tę regułę:
```adblock
filmweb.pl#@$#body,html { overflow: auto !important; position: initial !important; }
```
do reguł użytkownika.

commits.message: adjusted rules so no need to use hint

comment.body:
Currently, I am not in the group of A/B test. Unfortunately, on iOS, the video advertisement cannot be blocked by any adblocker including AdGuard and Unicorn Pro adblocker.  
But, I track the issue at https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/713 for Android user.

<details><summary>한국어 - Korean</summary>

현재, 제가 A/B 테스트 그룹에 있지 않습니다.
불행하게도 iOS에서는 그 비디오 동영상이 AdGuard와 유니콘 Pro 광고차단기를 포함해 어떤 광고차단기도 차단할 수 없습니다.
하지만, Android 사용자를 위해 https://github.com/List-KR/List-KR/issues/713 에서 이슈를 추적하고 있습니다.

</details>

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

-

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

`https://www.depend.com.au/incontinence-products/womens-products/real-fit-regular-for-women`

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard URL Tracking filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Go to:
`https://www.depend.com.au/incontinence-products/womens-products/real-fit-regular-for-women`
2. Click on `Buy Online`
3. Click on `Buy Now`
4. Two tracking redirects:
    * `https://productcatalog.channeladvisor.com/OnlineRetailerLink?InteractionSessionId=[ID]&UniqueUserId=[ID]&DeviceTypeId=[ID]&PCAT_vNextTracking_LocalWidget=true&PCAT_vNextTracking_OnlinePlrss=true&PCAT_vNextTracking_OnlineItrack=true&PCAT_vNextTracking_RetailerScoring=true&iTrackRedirectUrl=[URL]`
    * `https://go.skimresources.com/?id=[ID]&url=[URL]&xcust=[ID]`

Proposed filters:
```adb
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=InteractionSessionId
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=UniqueUserId
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=DeviceTypeId
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=PCAT_vNextTracking_LocalWidget
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=PCAT_vNextTracking_OnlinePlrss
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=PCAT_vNextTracking_OnlineItrack
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=PCAT_vNextTracking_RetailerScoring
||productcatalog.channeladvisor.com^$doc,removeparam=profileId
||go.skimresources.com^$doc,removeparam=id
||go.skimresources.com^$doc,removeparam=xcust
```

Related issue: https://github.com/uBlockOrigin/uAssets/issues/8066

issue.title: 9animetv.to
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://9animetv.to/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F9animetv.to%2F) ### Comment Username: @visiblyannoyedkitten > AdGuard used to block all ads and cancel any attempts of a website to redirect me to another site. HOWEVER, for some reason it’s not doing that anymore!! > On the website I linked (9anime.to) if I try to click ANYTHING it will redirect me to any number of countless scam websites. It opens up a new browsing window, and takes me to a completely different page/site. > This hasn’t ever been a problem for me before, because AdGuard wouldn’t allow them to take me anywhere — but all of a sudden AdGuard stopped blocking them! HELP!! > > I’ve spent the last day and a half trying to figure out what can be done. I’ve updated, made sure all filters are active and on, and tried updating the app several different times too. NOTHING works. When I click the spinning arrows in the top right of the screen, eventually (after I wait forever while it says it’s updating) it gives me the error “Filter update error” and stops. I’ve tried four separate times, just sitting here staring at those circling arrows until the error message pops up. I CAN’T GET IT TO WORK. ### Screenshots

comment.body:
> poplnの広告がブロックされていないので、popIn.ccをフィルタに追加してほしいです。

We have had years long discussion with many people including EL author, other Japanese contributors, and even other Japanese filter list maintainers about popIn and the current state is the result of that - block only popIn ads in Japanese filters, tracker in privacy lists, and the rest in Annoyances. Anyway I can't reproduce the screenshot with your settings.
